end-stone-bricks: Below is a table of the tools that can be used to break End Stone Bricks blocks, and the speed it will take to break at (in seconds). This is calculated with the formula (1.5 * Block Hardness) / Tool Multiplier.
End stone bricks are a decorative variant of end stone. They can be made by placing 4 endstone in a 2x2 formation in the crafting table.
Below you can find the crafting recipes that can be used to make End Stone Bricks.
